display_name: Average weekly frequency of strenuous exercise - Father
description: During a typical 7-day period (a week), how many times on the average do you do the following kinds of exercise for more than 15 minutes during your free time: STRENUOUS EXERCISE (HEART BEATS RAPIDLY) (e.g., running, jogging, hockey, football, soccer, squash, basketball, cross country skiing, judo, roller skating, vigorous swimming, vigorous long distance bicycling)
